text: Visited on a weekday afternoon and there were sufficient seats to enjoy the desserts & drinks. Ordered a hot mocha, croffle with Oreo ice cream, crispy matcha croffle and banana pudding matcha latte for a total of $47.63. Everything tasted really good! I like the kunafe in the matcha for the matcha croffle. The banana pudding matcha latte had just the right amount of sweetness and thickness. Will definitely visit again!

banana pudding matcha was pretty unique, and I liked that there were actual banana pieces in the drink. not too sweet, and the matcha flavour still came through. quite a big cup though $9.80+ is slightly steep. earl grey matcha was average. enjoyed the matcha cheese sammies; the cheese was punchy n the matcha cookie crust complemented the cheesiness surprisingly well

the place was really packed (1pm on a public holiday) and we waited 30min for our banana pudding and sammies

Came across this cafe many times on social media and today I finally tried it and I wished I've came here earlier.

The crispy matcha croffle was one of the best dessert I've ever tried. The matcha taste was very prominent while the croffle was crispy and buttery, along with the kunafeh which is made from shredded crispy phyllo pastry dough, the whole combination was perfect. Definitely would be back just for this.

I also tried the banana pudding matcha and it was also good. I was afraid that the banana pudding might be too sweet however it was just slightly sweetened and very well balanced.

I wonder if they might consider adding pistachio crumbs or pistachio paste as a topping to the matcha croffle as I believe it would be quite a good combination.
